page.john_has_been_buildi: John has been building developer tools for over a decade.
page.maria_specializes_in: Maria specializes in making complex tools simple to use.
page.were_on_a_mission_to:
We're on a mission to make internationalization accessible to every React developer.
          Our tools are built with love and attention to detail, ensuring your journey to
          global reach is smooth and enjoyable.
page.parlay_was_born_from:
Parlay was born from a simple observation: internationalizing React apps was too hard.
          We believed there had to be a better way. After months of development and testing,
          we created a solution that makes i18n feel like magic.
page.today_were_proud_to_:
Today, we're proud to help developers around the world make their apps accessible
          to global audiences with minimal effort.
page.we_believe_the_best_: We believe the best tools are the ones you barely notice using.
page.every_feature_we_bui: Every feature we build starts with the developer's needs in mind.
page.were_building_tools_: We're building tools for a connected world where every app can reach every user.
page.have_questions_wed_l: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message at hello@parlayapp.com
layout.made_with_by_the_par: Made with ❤️ by the Parlay Team
page.transform_your_react: Transform Your React Apps with Parlay
page.the_easiest_way_to_m: The easiest way to make your React applications global-ready.
page.get_your_app_ready_f: Get your app ready for internationalization in minutes, not hours.
page.leverage_cuttingedge: Leverage cutting-edge AI to translate your content accurately.
page.simple_cli_tools_and: Simple CLI tools and intuitive web interface make i18n a breeze.
page.subscribe_to_our_new: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and tips.
page.by_subscribing_you_a: By subscribing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
page.parlay_made_internat: "Parlay made internationalizing our app incredibly simple. We were up and running in no time!"
page.the_ai_translations_: "The AI translations are surprisingly accurate. It saved us countless hours of manual translation work."
